org.omnaest.utils.store.persistence
Class PersistenceAccessorDirectoryFiles<E>

java.lang.Object
  org.omnaest.utils.store.persistence.PersistenceAccessorDirectoryFiles<E>
Type Parameters:
E -
All Implemented Interfaces:
ElementStore.PersistenceAccessor<E>
public class PersistenceAccessorDirectoryFiles<E>
extends Object
implements ElementStore.PersistenceAccessor<E>

A ElementStore.PersistenceAccessor which uses a given directory to write Files to disk containing one marshalled element each.
To modify the marshaling syntax see setMarshallerAndUnmarshaller(MarshallerAndUnmarshaller)

Any Exception is catched and fowarded to registered ExceptionHandlers. See getExceptionHandlerRegistration() to register ExceptionHandlers.

Author:
Omnaest
